spec.name: Chfinja Masters
spec.description: Chfinja Masters specializes in making and selling **Sfenj**, a traditional Moroccan donut or fritter. Sfenj is a staple street food, deep-fried until golden and often served hot and dusted with sugar. Places dedicated to sfenj, like Chfinja Masters, are popular early morning stops for breakfast or a quick snack, emphasizing traditional, simple, and affordable Moroccan culinary practices.
